title: MP labor falling, firm produces where MC is rising

content.question: If labor is the only variable input of a firm and the marginal product of labor is falling, the firm will always produce

choices.label: more than the profit-maximizing level of output
less than the profit-maximizing level of output
at a level of output where average total cost is at a minimum
at a level of output where marginal costs are rising
at a level of output where average variable costs are falling

content.answer: at a level of output where marginal costs are rising

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Describe economic concepts, principles, or models.
